TopicTitle: Tylo gravity assists causes game crash

Articles.Content:
So i am trying to send a floating base to Lathye, but for some reason whenever I try to make a maneuver node to get a tylo gravity assist, the game freezes and crashes. I don’t know if it’s a mod that’s doing it(I don’t know how or why a mod would cause this) but this is really a pain in the butt. I remember Matt Lowne said in one of his videos he was having this problem. 

Edited August 4, 2020 by Lewie

2 hours ago, Lewie said:

I believe it's a bug with the base game. It would be nice if we could have a log though.
